segments.text: Food is less expensive in a cafeteria , because you serve yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just pick up a tray , then put a knife , a fork , a spoon and a paper napkin on it and stand in the line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will it take to reach the buffet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not long , because people rush for lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The line sure does move fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell the man behind the counter what you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I like that green vegetable but I don't know how to call it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just point to it if you don't know the name .
segments.speaker: S1
